attributes.action: Give a referendum to the peoples of the United Kingdom on wether they want to still be in the European Union.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The only question to askhte public is Do you still want to be in the European Union?.
If/When the people of this Great Country vote a reounding NO then abide by that decision

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
